name: Binary Operations Plugin
title: Binary Operations Plugin
description: Everything you need to start a WIPP plugin.
author: Data Scientist (data.scientist@labshare.org)
institution: National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences, National Institutes of Health

inputs.name: inpDir
inputs.description: Input image collection to be processed by this plugin

inputs.name: kernelsize
inputs.description: Kernel size that should be used for transformation

inputs.name: Operations
inputs.description: The Binary Operations that will be done on the image

inputs.name: dilateby
inputs.description: How much we are dilating by

inputs.name: erodeby
inputs.description: How much we are eroding by

inputs.name: HOMarray
inputs.description: Array that we are searching for. Ex: [0, 0, 0], [0, 0, 0], [0, 0, 0]

ui.title: Operations
ui.description: Operations that will be used on image

ui.title: Input collection
ui.description: Input image collection to be processed by this plugin

ui.title: Default Kernel Size
ui.description: Default Kernel Size to use for Operations

ui.title: Open Kernel Size
ui.description: Change Kernel Size to use for Opening

ui.title: Close Kernel Size
ui.description: Change Kernel Size to use for Closing

ui.title: Morphological Gradient Kernel Size
ui.description: Change Kernel Size to use for Morphological Gradient

ui.title: Dilate Kernel Size
ui.description: Change Kernel Size to use for Dilation

ui.title: Erode Kernel Size
ui.description: Change Kernel Size to use for Erosion

ui.title: Skeleton Kernel Size
ui.description: Change Kernel Size to use for Skeletonization

ui.title: Area Filtering Kernel Size
ui.description: Change Kernel Size to use for Area Filtering

ui.title: TopHat Kernel Size
ui.description: Change Kernel Size to use for TopHat

ui.title: BlackHat Kernel Size
ui.description: Change Kernel Size to use for BlackHat

ui.title: Dilate by
ui.description: How much we want to dilate by

ui.title: Erode by
ui.description: How much we want to erode by

ui.title: Hit or Miss Array
ui.description: Array that we are searching for
